item.title: Report I-2024110055
item.description:
Report I-2024110055

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-03T09:15:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-15
  • City: Denver
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHWEST AIRLINES CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Before push, passengefs phone in seat 18B began smoking and battery began a thermal runaway event. Passengers were deplaned via aircraft slide. Crew acted to extinguish phone and place in onboard containment bag. Passenger who owned the phone sitting in seat 18B received bums and was treated at hte scene. Another passenger bumped their head while evacuating and was also treated at the scene. No hospitalizations were needed.

item.title: Report X-2024111051
item.description:
Report X-2024111051

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-30T12:29:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-20
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Plastic bottles in plastic zip bags with LQ mark laid on side inside corrugated carton with paper filler. No hazard marks or arrows on exterior. Cap broke off one bottle and contents spilled, damaging carton and shipping label.
